entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
